txt.en: 'I'm going to make that apprentice run a mile in these!'
'Do you have mail for me? Hah! Do you get it? Mail?'
The leader of the Metalsmith's Guild has asked to please forge a pair of boots to show the apprentices.
The crafting recipes you must create can be bartered for from the Improved Recipes vendor.\n\nForge a pair of guild-pattern boots.
Execute the recipe for guild-pattern boots

The Guild Leader's face is buried in his hands.\n\n'An apprentice just presented me with a pair of boots so awful, I question whether or not the lad has ever seen feet before. Please make a pair of boots that could actually fit on feet.'
'Do you have mail for me? Hah! Do you get it? Mail?'
Executed the recipe for guild-pattern boots

The Guild Leader's face is buried in his hands.\n\n'An apprentice just presented me with a pair of boots so awful, I question whether or not the lad has ever seen feet before. Please make a pair of boots that could actually fit on feet.'
Turn in guild-pattern boots ([placeholder]/[placeholder]) to Hávar
'I'm going to make that apprentice run a mile in these!'
Talk to the Metalsmith's Guild Leader in Minas Morgul
Turn in guild-pattern boots ([placeholder]/[placeholder]) to the Metalsmith's Guild Leader in Minas Morgul
